info.title: Mensagia
info.description: Mensagia offers reliable SMS, Email and Voice messages for business automation communication.

allow_service_number_alias.description: Determines if the configuration allows alias
allow_service_number_alias.title: Allow Service Number Alias

get.description: Get configurations names stored into your Mensagia's account.
Get all agendas stored into your Mensagia's account.
Get a list with the emails enabled in your Mensagia account to send.
Get a list of the email templates stored into your Mensagia's account.
Get a list of the audio files stored into your Mensagia's account.
Get a list of the allowed phone numbers stored into your Mensagia's account.

in_SMS_blacklist.description: Determines if the contact is in the SMS Blacklist
in_SMS_blacklist.title: Is in SMS Blacklist

post.description: Send SMS's to your contacts through your Mensagia account.

configuration_name.description: Select the name that will appear in the header of your SMS.
configuration_name.title: Configuration Name

message.description: Text to be sent (no more than 160 characters).
message.title: Message

numbers.description: The mobile number of the recipient of this message. IMPORTANT: The number must have the corresponding country prefix.
numbers.title: Numbers

start_date.description: Sending date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm'. If you don't specify this parameter, the message will be sent immediately.
start_date.title: Start Date

url_parameters.description: Link tagging if there is a shortened link, Landing or Form in the message.
url_parameters.title: URL Paremeters

url_extrafields_mode.description: If you include shortened links or landings in your shipments, you can choose what value the custom fields will show when the recipient views the content.
url_extrafields_mode.title: URL Extrafields Mode

in_SMS_blacklist.description: Determines if the contact is in the SMS Blacklist
in_SMS_blacklist.title: Is in SMS Blacklist

post.description: Send SMS Campaigns to your contacts through your Mensagia account.

configuration_name.description: Select the name that will appear in the header of your SMS.
configuration_name.title: Configuration Name

message.description: Text to be sent (no more than 160 characters).
message.title: Message

available_groups.description: Assign the group to which the campaign will be directed.
available_groups.title: Available Group

start_date.description: Sending date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm'. If you don't specify this parameter, the message will be sent immediately.
start_date.title: Start Date

smsxblock.description: Number of recipients per block. Mandatory in the presence of 'Minutes Per Block'. If the two parameters are sent, the campaign configuration is defined as 'custom configuration' and the value of the parameters 'Days' and 'Time Intervals' will be considered.
smsxblock.title: Calls per Block

minutesxblock.description: Every few minutes the block of recipients chosen in 'Calls Per Block' will be sent. Mandatory in the presence of 'Calls Per Block'. If the two parameters are sent, the campaign configuration is defined as 'custom configuration' and the value of the parameters 'Days' and 'Time Intervals' will be considered.
minutesxblock.title: Minutes per Block

days.description: A list of days of the week separated by commas and without spaces on which calls can be made. (1,2,3,4,5,6,7)
days.title: Days

time_intervals.description: A list of time intervals separated by commas and without spaces, in which the call can be sent. It will only be taken into account if 'Minutes Per Block' and 'Calls Per Block' are sent.(hh:mm-hh:mm,hh:mm-hh:mm...)
time_intervals.title: Time Intervals

url_parameters.description: Link tagging if there is a shortened link, Landing or Form in the message.
url_parameters.title: URL Paremeters

url_extrafields_mode.description: If you include shortened links or landings in your shipments, you can choose what value the custom fields will show when the recipient views the content.
url_extrafields_mode.title: URL Extrafields Mode

domain_id.description: ID of the registered Domain from which the mail is sent.
domain_id.title: Domain ID

from_name.description: Name of the person sending the message.
from_name.title: Sender Name

to.description: Details of the recipients of the message.
to.title: To

post.description: Send a Transactional email to your contacts using your custom templates from Mensagia.

from.description: An email address that will act as the sender. It must be a sending address created on the platform, or a sending address with a domain validated and authenticated on the platform.
from.title: From

from_name.description: Send this field if you want to use a different sender name than the one stored in a sending address on the platform if you will use one that is already created.
from_name.title: From Name

to.description: The email address to which the shipment is made.
to.title: To

html.description: The HTML to send. Required without Template parameter.
html.title: HTML

template_id.description: You can use an email template configured in your Mensagia account to obtain the HTML for sending. If this parameter is sent, the HTML parameter will be ignored.
template_id.title: Template

start_date.description: Shipment date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm'. If you do not send this parameter, the sending will be made immediately.
start_date.title: Send At

url_parameters.description: Tagging of links in the content of the email.
url_parameters.title: URL Parameters

attachments.description: A comma separated list of URLs with the files to attach. You can attach up to 5M in files.
attachments.title: Attachments

active.description: Determines if the campaign is currently active
active.title: Is Campaign Active

vm_validated_phone_id.description: Validated phone ID to send the Campaign
vm_validated_phone_id.title: Validated Phone ID

groups.description: Agendas to which the campaign is directed.
groups.title: Agendas

numbers.description: Numbers to which the campaign is directed.
numbers.title: Numbers

min_retry_minutes.description: Minimum minutes' interval to wait until the next try.
min_retry_minutes.title: Minimum Retries Minutes

max_retry_minutes.description: Maximum minutes' interval to wait until the next try.
max_retry_minutes.title: Max Retries Minutes

transfer_to.description: Specifies the number to which the call will be redirected if necessary.
transfer_to.title: Transfer To

response_codes.description: Response codes assigned to the call.
response_codes.title: Response Codes

items.description: Days allowed to send the voice campaign
items.title: Days Allowed

days_allowed.description: Days allowed to send the voice campaign,
days_allowed.title: Days Allowed

time_intervals_allowed.description: Time intervals allowed to send the voice campaign,
time_intervals_allowed.title: Time Intervals Allowed

ring_timeout.description: Maximum time in which the call ring will sound until the attempt is completed.
ring_timeout.title: Voice Ring Timeout

post.description: This method allows you to carry out Voice campaigns to telephone numbers in Spain. The recipients of the voice campaign can be: agendas, agendas and telephone numbers, or telephone numbers.

name.description: The name for the new voice campaign.
name.title: Name

vm_validated_phone_id.description: The phone that will be used in this voice campaign.
vm_validated_phone_id.title: Validated Phone

type.title: Type Locution
type.description: The type of voiceover that will be used in this voice campaign.

message.description: The text to be synthesized to reproduce in the call. Mandatory field if text2speech is the type of speech chosen.
message.title: Message

message_language.description: The code of the language with which you want to synthesize the text that will be reproduced in the call. Mandatory field if text2speech is the type of speech chosen.
message_language.title: Message Language

voice_file_id.description: The audio library file that will be used as a voiceover. Mandatory field if file is the type of speech chosen.
voice_file_id.title: Voice File

numbers.description: A list of phone numbers separated by commas, without spaces and with the international prefix.
numbers.title: Numbers

available_groups.description: List of contacts to whom the campaign will be sent.
available_groups.title: Available Groups

max_retries.description: Number of retries to perform if the recipient of the call does not answer.
max_retries.title: Max Retries

minutes_retry_1.description: Interval in minutes in which the first retry will be made after the first call is not answered. This field is mandatory if "Max Retries" is greater than 1.
minutes_retry_1.title: Minutes in retry 1

minutes_retry_2.description: Interval in minutes in which the first retry will be made after the first call is not answered. This field is mandatory if "Max Retries" is greater than 2.
minutes_retry_2.title: Minutes in retry 2

minutes_retry_3.description: Interval in minutes in which the first retry will be made after the first call is not answered. This field is mandatory if "Max Retries" is greater than 3.
minutes_retry_3.title: Minutes in retry 3

minutes_retry_4.description: Interval in minutes in which the first retry will be made after the first call is not answered. This field is mandatory if "Max Retries" is greater than 4.
minutes_retry_4.title: Minutes in retry 4

ring_timeout.description: Time in seconds in which the recipient's phone will ring for you to pick up the call.
ring_timeout.title: Ring Timeout

response_codes.description: (JSON) Response codes that can be pressed by the recipient that will generate an action on the call.
response_codes.title: Response Codes

response_codes_timeout.description: Time in seconds in which the recipient will be able to press a reply code. This field is mandatory in the presence of 'Response Codes'
response_codes_timeout.title: Response Codes Timeout

start_date.description: Campaign start date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm'. If you don't send this parameter, the campaign will start two minutes after the creation of the new campaign.
start_date.title: Start Date

callsxblock.description: Number of recipients per block. Mandatory in the presence of 'Minutes Per Block'. If the two parameters are sent, the campaign configuration is defined as 'custom configuration' and the value of the parameters 'Days' and 'Time Intervals' will be considered.
callsxblock.title: Calls per Block

minutesxblock.description: Every few minutes the block of recipients chosen in 'Calls Per Block' will be sent. Mandatory in the presence of 'Calls Per Block'. If the two parameters are sent, the campaign configuration is defined as 'custom configuration' and the value of the parameters 'Days' and 'Time Intervals' will be considered.
minutesxblock.title: Minutes per Block

days.description: A list of days of the week separated by commas and without spaces on which calls can be made. (1,2,3,4,5,6,7)
days.title: Days

time_intervals.description: A list of time intervals separated by commas and without spaces, in which the call can be sent. It will only be taken into account if 'Minutes Per Block' and 'Calls Per Block' are sent.(hh:mm-hh:mm,hh:mm-hh:mm...)
time_intervals.title: Time Intervals

in_sms_blacklist.description: Determines if the contact is in the SMS Blacklist
in_sms_blacklist.title: Is in SMS Blacklist

in_voice_blacklist.description: Determines if the contact is in the Voice Blacklist
in_voice_blacklist.title: Is in Voice Blacklist

in_mail_blacklist.description: Determines if the contact is in the Email Blacklist
in_mail_blacklist.title: Is in Email Blacklist

post.description: Create a contact inside your Mensagia's account.

parameters.name: in_mail_blacklist
parameters.description: Specify if your contact is on the Email blacklist.

parameters.name: in_sms_blacklist
parameters.description: Specify if your contact is on in_voice_blacklist.

parameters.name: in_voice_blacklist
parameters.description: Specify if your contact is on the Voice blacklist.

number.description: The contact's mobile number without blank spaces, with the international prefix and without the + sign.
number.title: Number

name.description: Name of the contact within Mensagia.
name.title: Name

groups.description: Add your contact to an address book
groups.title: Agenda

get.description: Get a list of 2 Way SMS's numbers through your Mensagia account.
Get a list of 2 Way SMS through your Mensagia account.

post.description: Send a 2 Way SMS to your contacts through your Mensagia account.

number.description: The number 2 Way SMS by which the message is to be sent
number.title: Number

message.description: Text to be sent (no more than 160 characters).
message.title: Message
